lexUnit.name: tall.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: of great or more than average height.

sentence.text: He was a tall , bony old man , with a long melancholy face and little bushy whiskers -- ` lamb cutlets , " thou ght Breeze , for they were too small to be called ordinary mutton chops .
She was tall , big-boned and well-covered , with grey hair as coarse as a horse 's tail straying from her mob-cap .
Charity was tall , and thinner now than she had ever been , because of her last rotation with its odd hours and incred ible stress .
He saw a tall boy slide down the door of the shop and lie still on the pavement .
A tall boy was walking unhurriedly down the drive towards them .
The tall boy patted his small chum on the shoulder .
The tall lanky figure of Billy Tolboys was slouched in the comer seat by the fire .
The urgent blare of his car horn drew their attention back to the sheriff 's tall figure .
His tall frame , in its butler 's black and white , seemed to vibrate .
As he reached the porch the door opened and the tall skinny frame of Sammy Pockets came walking out .
This tall girl , so beautifully yet so casually dressed , immediately made her feel insignificant , irrelevant even .

A tall French-Canadian and a Japanese-American girl who sat with them had taken the precaution of handing their luggage over to someone in tourist class where the doors were locked for the duration of the journey .
He was accompanied by a tall , dark-haired girl with pale skin and blue eyes whom he introduced as his fiancée .
I went up to the tall , dark girl .
Following these up , I went into a chemist 's shop , introduced myself to the tall lady assistant and said that I was D a friend of her future husband 's brother .
She liked the tall lady , and she was very curious to hear all about the Brownie girls who , although real , worked magic as the Brownie folk used to do .
In came a tall lady , with dark hair and eyes , and a large , pale forehead .
He introduced himself with a slight bow to the tall man .
A tall dark man , sitting in the corner , watched Mr Bumble while he drank .
Two tall men entered without bothering to ask for permission .
The tall man elbowed his way past the curtain and peered at the patient .
Beside Benedicta stood a tall man , his features quite clear in the torchlight .
She saw a tall woman in the mirror , shapely , body closely covered by a black leotard scooped deeply at the neck .
Guy had always liked tall women , preferably those built on rather buxom lines , but right now he could n't for the life of him remember why .
The tall woman strode to his desk and laid the folder open in front of him .
